title: CLIProv: A Contrastive Log-to-Intelligence Multimodal Approach for Threat Detection and Provenance Analysis
summary: With the increasing complexity of cyberattacks, the proactive and forward-looking nature of threat intelligence has become more crucial for threat detection and provenance analysis. However, translating high-level attack patterns described in Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures (TTP) intelligence into actionable security policies remains a significant challenge.
